span.b: BREAKFAST AND LUNCH IS ON US!
THE VAIL SCHOOL DISTRICT IS DELIVERING FREE MEALS THROUGHOUT OUR COMMUNITY TO ANY CHILD 18 YEARS AND YOUNGER!

b.span: The program will start on Tuesday, March 31st and will run through May 22, 2020.
Daily lunch and breakfast will be provided M-F from 10 a.m. – 12 p.m.
Children should be present to receive meals. If children are not present, parents must complete additional verification to receive meals for their children.
No reservations necessary… just head to any one of the stops most convenient to you that are listed on the flyer and on the Vail School District website!
Please stay in your cars as we are implementing a drive through system of pick up.
If you are walking to the stops, remember to wait in line with proper social distancing.
If you have any questions or would like further information, please contact Heather Stough at 520-879-3915 or stoughh@vailschooldistrict.org.

Vail, AZ 85641
